thread.title: Palme d'Or winner Kore-eda says he knew film was special

title: Palme d'Or winner Kore-eda says he knew film was special
text:
Palme d'Or winner Kore-eda says he knew film was special Saturday, May 19, 2018 - 00:37
Japanese director Hirokazu Kore-eda, whose film ''Shoplifters'' (''Manbiki Kazoku'') won the Cannes Film Festival's top Palme d'Or prize on Saturday (May 19), said he realised his film had ''something special'' from the moment it was screened. Rough cut (no reporter narration)
Japanese director Hirokazu Kore-eda, whose film "Shoplifters" ("Manbiki Kazoku") won the Cannes Film Festival's top Palme d'Or prize on Saturday (May 19), said he realised his film had "something special" from the moment it was screened. Rough cut (no reporter narration) //reut.rs/2IvxGok
